name: SCNPhysicsWorld.TestSearchMode
desc: Options affecting how SceneKit searches for bodies in a collision, ray, or sweep test, used with the searchMode key.

items.name: static let all: SCNPhysicsWorld.TestSearchMode
items.desc: Searches should return all contacts matching the search parameters.

items.name: static let any: SCNPhysicsWorld.TestSearchMode
items.desc: Searches should return only the first contact found regardless of its position relative to the search parameters.

items.name: static let closest: SCNPhysicsWorld.TestSearchMode
items.desc: Searches should return only the closest contact to the beginning of the search.
